description:
The first DLC of METALLIC CHILD is a crossover with Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin!
An additional Kokorowa Custom with exclusive weapons!

-A robotic Kokorowa!
A Custom to dress up Rona like Kokorowa!
Kokorowa, always poised and dignified!

-Battle with finesse!
This crossover Custom also includes exclusive weapons.
Bring Kokorowa-style finesse to the battlefield of METALLIC CHILD!
Will the powers of enlightenment prove to stand against machines of the future??

-Look out for the changes in the field!
It's not just a matter of looks, many changes can be found in the field, so don't miss them!

-A fierce boss!
"Black Shadow" will be waiting for you as the Keeper.
But, wait! What's that on its sides?
An onslaught of melee and energy ball attacks!!
name: METALLIC CHILD x Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin Crossover Custom 'Kokorowa'
